alert.note: Alert for Leake; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:14PM CDT until May 12 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Leake County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 314 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Harperville, or 9 miles north of Forest, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carthage, Walnut Grove, Hillsboro, Standing Pine, Sebastopol, Harperville, Lena, Tuscola, Madden and Steele. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
